1.9.4.0.4.2:
Prevent a crash when outside of the world (like in the void)
Fix compatibility with Java versions before 8
1.9.4.0.4.1: Strip extra stuff from the end of the entity count line
1.9.4.0.4.0:
Add parsing the colors from hex format
Add individual toggle options for the information types
Some configs changed because of this, delete your old config!!
1.9.4.0.3.0:
Add entity count as an available information type
Add config option to sort the lines by their length
Add a config option to change the coordinate line's formatting
1.9.4.0.2.0: Port the 0.2.0 version from 1.9 to MC 1.9.4
